name: lastbastion
bio: i see the world for what it is
messages: hate to say it but THEMOUSER is lowkey fake
like love them and all, but we all pretend like we don't know something is up
they act so sus sometimes... and the voice filter on stream is really weird
maybe it's a confidence issue. i wish they knew we love them for who they are
appeal_message: sorry, i didn't mean to overstep. it's true though, we'll love you no matter what, THEMOUSER :(
